meanings.sent1: During the parade, the children waved colorful bannerets.
meanings.sent2: The castle courtyard was decorated with many bannerets for the celebration.
meanings.sent3: The tiny bannerets fluttered in the wind like cheerful butterflies.
meanings.sent4: The bannerets marked the entrance to the festive fair.
meanings.sent5: The knight's squire proudly carried the bannerets into battle.

meanings.sent1: The king bestowed the title of baronet upon the brave knight, creating bannerets.
meanings.sent2: The bannerets were honored for their valor in the jousting tournament.
meanings.sent3: The bannerets were so chivalrous that they even rescued a kitten from a tree.
meanings.sent4: The bannerets' armor gleamed in the sunlight as they rode into the royal court.
meanings.sent5: The bannerets' loyalty to the kingdom was unwavering.

meanings.sent1: The bannerets were granted to the nobleman for his exemplary service.
meanings.sent2: The title of bannerets was reserved for those who showed great courage in battle.
meanings.sent3: The bannerets were so esteemed that even the birds sang their praises.
meanings.sent4: The bannerets stood out in the crowd, their honor shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The bannerets were symbols of respect and admiration in the kingdom.
